channel.title: Uhm..?
channel.description: Welll one of my friends tried to come play with me to help me with some ideas on the server but the client said that "Java was not recognized as an internal or external file" Does that mean he has to set his path?

item.title: Uhm..?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:1, topic:517484”]Welll one of my friends tried to come play with me to help me with some ideas on the server but the client said that “Java was not recognized as an internal or external file”
Does that mean he has to set his path?[/quote]
Yes, he needs to include the JRE in his path. He could also take the shortcut way out and specify the direct path to his java executable in the batch file. IE: C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe

Read full topic
